content:
/>
II.iii.2.B.1.c
.
Prescribed Supplemental Claim Form
Supplemental claims must be submitted on the prescribed supplemental claim form,
VA Form 20-0995, Decision Review Request:  Supplemental Claim
.
Reference
:  For more information on the definition of a complete supplemental claim, see
38 CFR 3.160(a)
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section B - Supplemental Claims
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section B
